attributes.action: Save the Herts and Beds Police Helicopter
attributes.additional_details: Persuade the Herts and Beds Police Authorities to keep our Police Helicopter. Without Chiltern Air Support East Base, RAF Henlow, Herts and Beds will have no air support within a useful time frame to have any assistance to ground units. Without air support, vehicle pursuits will not be authorised and general crime will increase in the area.
